item.title: Top Verizon Promo Codes & Deals | August 2025
item.description: Save with our roundup of the best Verizon coupons for free iPhone 16 Pros up to $1,100 off new Galaxy phones, and plans up to 50% off this August.

item.title: Space Force bets on commercial entrants in $4B satcom contest
item.description: The Space Force is leveraging commercial competition for the next phase of its PTS program.

item.title: Nvidia AI chip challenger Groq said to be nearing new fundraising at $6B valuation
item.description: AI chip startup Groq is in talks to raise a fresh $600 million at a near $6 billion valuation, sources tell Bloomberg, although the deal isn’t yet fin...

item.title: Luma and Runway expect robotics to eventually be a big revenue driver for them
item.description: Both Luma and Runway have reportedly held conversations with self-driving car and robotics companies as they look toward the future.

item.title: Google says UK government has not demanded an encryption backdoor for its users’ data
